talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>OK, don't panic. When a voe starts a
conversation with you...<sp:5:1:0>the first step is...<sp:5:1:0>
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>What, already? <sp:5:0:0>Isn't that moving a little
fast? <sp:5:1:0>Besides, there's all sorts of chaos
going on in the outside world right now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Maybe you should get some advice from
that trio of graduates from the class?<sp:0:4:0>I think they're still hanging out around
Outskirt Stable.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Patricia<clr:ffff>? Isn't that the chief's beloved
sand seal?
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I remember what I'm supposed to do...
I'm supposed to... <sp:5:1:0>Nope, I'm drawing
a blank.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Even after all the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> classes<clr:ffff>,
as soon as I'm in a real-world situation,
all those lessons just vanish.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>I knew I should have spent more time practicing.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm...yeah, maybe. A short trip could be
a good chance to get more practice in.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I hear if you give her a splash fruit, she
says a string of strange numbers.<sp:0:4:0>And I thought...<sp:5:0:0>maybe those numbers are
code for some <clr:0000>location<clr:ffff>.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now then, when you notice a voe
watching you...
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I've been so relieved ever since I had a
natural conversation with a voe. That voe
being you, I mean.<sp:0:4:0>It wasn't as hair-raising as I was afraid of.
Must have been all that practice.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>It's all thanks to you. Sarq!
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've been so anxious about talking to a
voe, but I felt like you and I had a pretty
natural conversation.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>If you wouldn't mind...it would be nice for
you to swing by the "Voe and You" class
again. <sp:5:0:0>If you feel like it.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Just thinking about a voe being here, of
all places, has me pretty rattled.<sp:0:4:0>But you know what would help me keep
calm? A nice, delicious beverage.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Heheh. <sp:5:0:0>Hey, listen to this.<sp:0:4:0>I finally had a normal conversation with
a voe!<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>And believe it or not, <sp:5:0:0>the key to it all was
a Noble Pursuit!
talk0007:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey.<sp:0:4:0>Don't look now, but...<sp:5:1:0>that's a voe talking to
us, right?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hah. Good for you.<sp:0:4:0>And I'm not surprised. I first came up with
the recipe when I was out searching for
my own one true voe.
talk0008:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad>I think you're right.<sp:0:4:0>But I've just started with the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>,
so I'm not sure what to do about it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Wow, you don't miss a trick!<sp:0:4:0>You'll have to teach me the finer points
of vai-voe relations sometime.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>There's nothing to it. Look into his eyes
and say this...<sp:0:4:0>"I had you in mind when I mixed this
drink." <sp:5:1:0>Exactly like that.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Say, let me ask you something.<sp:0:4:0>How did you use Noble Pursuit on your
own quest for a special voe?
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>The return of the Noble Pursuit couldn't
have been better timed.<sp:0:4:0>Did I really have a natural conversation
with a voe?<sp:0:4:0>It wasn't as hair-raising as I was afraid of.
Must have been all that practice.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>It's all thanks to you. Sarq!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>What? <sp:5:1:0>Oh...I get it.<sp:5:1:0> <sp:3:0:2:0800>You're hoping it's a
clue to where you'll find your beloved voe.
<sp:5:1:0>Am I close?
talk0024:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey.<sp:0:4:0>Don't look now, but...<sp:5:1:0>that's a voe watching
us, right?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Yes! Exactly, <sp:5:1:0>Nali.<sp:0:4:0>We have to go see Patricia together,
and soon.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't believe I have to keep telling you
this, Pritana.<sp:0:4:0>There's no way I can mix a Noble Pursuit
down here in the shelter.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>Please address all complaints to the
sand shroud.
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Pritana. Don't use my canteen as a place
to hole up.<sp:0:4:0>I hope when the time comes, you find a
voe who can mix Noble Pursuits for you.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive>Hey, Nali?<sp:0:4:0>I'm thinking it might be time soon for me
to go out and find my special voe.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Hey, did you hear about the mysterious
prophecy from Patricia?
